text: hey <@U7HH7NQKY>, is in your agenda give us the ability to generate visual templates by FTP or at least edit them? I would really love work locally and update them as we can do now with the JSON for custom modules :slightly_smiling_face:

Idea: Update require_js and require_css functions to add a custom attributes bit

For example require_js(“JAVASCRIPT FILE”,“FOOTER”,“defer”)
can’t think of one for css atm but I had one I wanted to use the other day. I mean i guess specifying the rel type would be nice
